content: this pretty lace crochet bolero is made from a simple rectangle that s seamed and edged to create sleeves that makes it a perfect first garment project for beginners this piece contains sizing guidance for girls sizes from 2-4 to 11-12 and womens sizes from s/m to xxl/xxl so you can make one for any size or two for some mommy and me cuteness there are 2 full repeats in 3 or 12 sts and 8 row in 3 your yardage will vary with size but you should be able to complete all but the largest size with 2 skeins of the recommended yarn around 600 yards the largest size will need just a bit more than that i was able to complete the 5-6 size with just over half a skein so around 150-200 yards
